name: Dr. Jen Wolkin | ADHD + Trauma + Anxiety Info

content.html: If we understand our mind-body-brain is just trying to cope, we can perhaps STOP gaslighting ourselves into the narrative we are lazy. The shut-down/freeze part wants to feel seen, and needs our compassion. Gentle, Gentle, Gentle.
content.value:
If we understand our mind-body-brain is just trying to cope, 

we can perhaps STOP gaslighting ourselves into the narrative we are lazy. 

The shut-down/freeze part wants to feel seen, and needs our compassion. 

Gentle, Gentle, Gentle.
